com.camerontec.catalys.core.message

Interface IToMessageTransformer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMessageTransformer, ISolaceMessageTransformer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJMSTransformer, FIXMLTransformer, FixTransportTransformer, FlexibleTagTransformer, MQTransformer, OlympicRawTransformer, SocketAdapterRawTransformer, SolaceRawFIXSendingTransformer, SolaceRawTransformer, SolaceStringFIXSendingTransformer, SolaceStringTransformer, StandardFixDeserializationTransformer, StandardFixTransformer, StringToMessageTransformer, TechnologyAdapterFIXSendingTransformer, TIBRVNameTransformer, TIBRVRawTransformer, TIBRVTransformer

    public interface IToMessageTransformer
    Transformer for converting objects into IFIXMessages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFIXMessage toMessage(Object source, IFIXMessage target)
      Transform the given object into a message.
      IFIXMessage toMessage(Object source, IFIXMessage target, boolean dialectAllowNoLengthOnRawData)
      Transform the given object into a message.

    • Method Detail

      • toMessage

        IFIXMessage toMessage(Object source,
                      IFIXMessage target,
                      boolean dialectAllowNoLengthOnRawData)
               throws IllegalArgumentException,
                      UnsupportedOperationException,
                      NullPointerException
        Transform the given object into a message.
        Parameters:
        source - Object from which message is derived.
        target - The message into which the object is to be transformed. Cannot be null.
        dialectAllowNoLengthOnRawData - True to indicate that no special treatment is to be given to raw data and their associated length fields (that is, they are expected to conform to regular field content and in particular the data field should not contain FIX SOH). False to treat the data field as opaque and use its preceding length field to determine its length (this is the "FIX compliant" mode).
        Returns:
        IFIXMessage target message (transformed from source)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If it was not possible to derive a message from the given object.
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this form of transformation is not supported by this transformer.
        NullPointerException - if target was null and is needed by a particular implementation of this interface method

      • toMessage

        IFIXMessage toMessage(Object source,
                      IFIXMessage target)
               throws IllegalArgumentException,
                      UnsupportedOperationException,
                      NullPointerException
        Transform the given object into a message.

        This is a shortcut for toMessage(source, target, false).

        Parameters:
        source - Object from which message is derived.
        target - The message into which the object is to be transformed. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        IFIXMessage target message (transformed from source)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If it was not possible to derive a message from the given object.
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this form of transformation is not supported by this transformer.
        NullPointerException - if target was null and is needed by a particular implementation of this interface method
